name: Online Group Study
description: A platform where users can view and add tourist spots, including their details like name, location, and description. Users need to log in to access the features.
features: This is an inventory management website so you can manage products here
You can login via mail, password, and also through Google
You can add new products
User can delete their orders
In product details page you can see details of the products
Admin can delete products
All the data are stored in MongoDB, so the data are not lost after refreshing
Responsive, so it can also be used via mobile phones

name: Fund Raising Website
description: An e-commerce platform where users can browse products, add them to the cart, and proceed to checkout. It includes a login and registration system.

name: Vistara Tourist Spots
description: A simple app to calculate ticket fares based on different categories like free tickets, student discounts, and senior citizen discounts.
